title: Irrigation and clean water bring life back to Jarey (full version)

tasks.task: Farmers in Nani village addressing water and land management issues to improve agriculture and sanitation.
subtasks: Fencing the water source to prevent contamination.

tasks.task: Tackling sanitation and agricultural produce improvements.
subtasks: Reviving fallow land with irrigation systems.
Planting a variety of vegetables in household gardens.
Planning a farm road for new economic opportunities.
